channel.title: All my Players Keep Disconnecting! ----> Please Help
channel.description:
My Players are Connecting, and There Connection is Getting Accepted But straight after they Connect, they either have:
A weird Username like - fbfbdrgvrgd34r And there invisible
or
It will disconnect them and say this: Here is one of my friends for example, Skiller99
[code]Game saved for player Skiller99 ClientHandler: Client Skiller99 disconnected.[/code]

item.title: All my Players Keep Disconnecting! ----> Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Its because the current client you are using doesnt have the correct cache loading for the server you`re using.

Read full topic
item.source: All my Players Keep Disconnecting! ----> Please Help

item.title: All my Players Keep Disconnecting! ----> Please Help
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

hes trying to say if your using the website rs-ps.org change the loader you set it on and
that wont happen either that or your computer is just laggy

Read full topic
item.source: All my Players Keep Disconnecting! ----> Please Help

item.title: All my Players Keep Disconnecting! ----> Please Help
item.dc:creator: @AllStarUltimate AllStarUltimate
item.description:
@AllStarUltimate wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:2, topic:417562”][quote author=AllStarUltimate link=topic=520116.msg3776810#msg3776810 date=1318152018]
My Players are Connecting, and There Connection is Getting Accepted
But straight after they Connect, they either have:

A weird Username like - fbfbdrgvrgd34r
And there invisible

or

It will disconnect them and say this:
Here is one of my friends for example, Skiller99

Game saved for player Skiller99 ClientHandler: Client Skiller99 disconnected.
[/quote]

it i your client, im assuming your using (www.r s-p s. o r g)
chang the webclient loader and it should be all good.[/quote]

When people use my client it disconnects them too though.

Read full topic
item.source: All my Players Keep Disconnecting! ----> Please Help
